recipesJson.name: Strawberry apple mango
recipesJson.author: art228
recipesJson.description: Sweet strawberry and apples. Easy to mix and perfect for summer. The mango isnâ€™t very pronounced. The forward note is apples. Almost apple juice type apple with a light sweet strawberry accent. The mango helps tie the two together and sweeten the mix. The vape gives off an almost whip cream or light cream type exhale imo.
